@ DVD-DL, u need a few programs dl (winrar, abgx360 & imgburn). 1st dl file from tpb, 2nd open winrar select game file & select extract here, 3rd open abgx360, select game file & run program. This will create a dvd file u can burn to dual layer media. 4th finally open imgburn, select dvd file and burn to disc. Hope this helps man... have fun.
